english.segment1: You made the call. I step outside, cross that line. And I lose control. cause I've been waiting. It's beautifull to let go don't you know. Your everything I try to be. The rise and fall to respond to the call. I got butterflies
english.segment2: Your all I have. So break me down. Your all I am. And nothing else matters
english.segment3: This is a long shot. It's all I have. I'm ready to step it up. And all I need is your hand. And this is a long shot. Its who I am. I'm ready to take off. All I need is a plan
english.segment4: I'm calling out. Take me, make me. I'm finding out. That You are my reason. It's beautifull to let go don't you know. Your everything I try to be. The rise and fall to respond to the call. I sing a new song
english.segment5: You're all I have. So break me down. You're all I am. But nothing else matters. You're all I have. So break me down. You're all I am. And nothing else matters

english.segment7: You're all I have x3. Yeah
english.segment9: This is a long shot. It's all I have. I'm ready to step it up. And all I need is your hand. And This is a long shot. It's who I am. I'm ready to take off. All I need is a plan
english.segment10: This is a long shot. This is the longest shot. I'm barely moving. You keep me breathing. This is a long shot. This is the longest shot. Cause I'm barely moving. You keep me breathing
